resources.string: This information is extracted from the ESCADâ€‹ database. It is not \'real time\' information, but is provided as a general indication of current activity. Incident information is updated every 30 minutes, with Emergency Warning or Watch and Act messages updated every 10 minutes. The symbols represent the general area of the fire, not it\'s current location or spread. Although every care is taken to ensure that all information on this web site is accurate and up to date, Emergency Watch nor the information origins can accept any responsibility for mistakes or omissions. During outages of the Bushfire Incident Information, members of the public should refer to their ABC Local Radio station for bushfire information and updates.
